content: If the value is there — does it really matter if you are being sold to? It’s your decision weather you enquire further about that companies products/services or weather you close that tab. Granted some companies ‘shove it down your throat’ for lack of a better phrase, but that’s the exception not the rule. I write 50% because I enjoy writing, 50% because ‘yes’ i’ll put my hand up and say i’m trying to market my business with content. The sooner we can have conversations about our business and what we can offer, rather than pretend money/customers/clients aren’t an issue, then the better. I liked your article — well done for having the balls to speak up!
